pactAbilities.Description: A storm in a sphere. Enemies in the storm take extra Voltaic damage. Amped by Atmos.
pactAbilities.Effect: Create a zone that makes enemies take more damage.

pactAbilities.Description: A covert device of Ode'n armour. Orbited by Atmos, you are shielded from strikes. Amped by Astra.
pactAbilities.Effect: Grant protection to you & nearby allies.

pactAbilities.Description: Like granting tree bark. Chance to steal armour strength from target on every attack.
pactAbilities.Effect: Steals armour from enemies.

pactAbilities.Description: Make them kneel. Enemies take damage at your command. Rend them weakened with lowered defenses.
pactAbilities.Effect: Incapacitate nearby enemies.

pactAbilities.Description: Cement your Enemies to stone... for time. Apt to shatter under strikes or be free all the sooner.
pactAbilities.Effect: Petrifies enemies near point of impact. Attack petrified enemy to break CC early & deal extra damage.

pactAbilities.Description: Sing the auld warsong. Attract attention from nearby enemies. Increased damage. Increased defense.
pactAbilities.Effect: Aggro nearby enemies. as well as buff your weapon damage & DR.

pactAbilities.Description: The trees sing in your favour. Small amount of damage blocked by armour is dealt to attacker.
Sound your ensign. Stagger and Stun Enemies within your shockwave. Increased defense against Stagger.
pactAbilities.Effect: Deal stagger to nearby enemies. Reduce stagger taken.

pactAbilities.Description: Each battle, a drop in the well of war. Absorb a small amount of Life from Enemies you fell.
pactAbilities.Effect: Regain HP every kill.

pactAbilities.Description: Reap the long-sowed seed of the Elderbloom. Restore Life to all Envoys within the puff of pollen.
pactAbilities.Effect: Place a plant on the ground that heals all envoys within range every half second.

pactAbilities.Description: Do not stroke the quiet ember. Enemies that dare attack trigger a blast of defensive flame.
pactAbilities.Effect: Getting hit triggers an AoE attack around you.

pactAbilities.Description: Summon the wrath of The Felling. Consecutive melee strikes deal accumulative damage.
pactAbilities.Effect: Every successful weapon strike increases weapon damage.

pactAbilities.Description: Mother loves fiercely. Orengall leaps into combat. Increase chance with each point spent.
pactAbilities.Effect: Orengall randomly appears to take down an enemy.

pactAbilities.Description: Cast a veil of magicks to hide you from your foes. Float like a nightmoth and attack from behind.
pactAbilities.Effect: Become a butterfly, essentially turning invisible.

pactAbilities.Description: Latch onto your target with Synsylk thread. Fly forth and strike to deal additional Voltaic damage.
pactAbilities.Effect: Kick while facing an enemy to grapple towards it.

pactAbilities.Description: Rally your herd. Healing yourself and your party cultivates Idol power.
pactAbilities.Effect: Allows you to gain idol power by healing yourself and allies.

pactAbilities.Description: Sing your blood song. Increased Courage and chance of Smite for you and your party. Ode dogs turn on their masters.
pactAbilities.Effect: Buff Courage and smite chance for you and nearby allies. Nearby enemy dogs are temporarily befriended.

pactAbilities.Description: The fire within burns ever brighter. Taking fire damage increases Weapon damage.
pactAbilities.Effect: Taking fire damage temporarily buffs your Weapon damage.

pactAbilities.Description: Wake the old flame, set the earth ablaze. Enemies in area of effect take fire damage.
pactAbilities.Effect: Set the ground around you on fire.

pactAbilities.Description: Cast an arc of inferno. Bonus damage if the target is already on fire.
pactAbilities.Effect: Cast a fireball that deals more damage to enemies on fire.

pactAbilities.Description: Hold your ground. Low Life triggers increased attack speed.
pactAbilities.Effect: Increased attack speed while below 45% HP.

pactAbilities.Description: Pound the earth with meteoric force. Deal additional Voltaic damage on downed Enemies.
pactAbilities.Effect: First strike of ground finisher deals extra instance of damage.

pactAbilities.Description: Call upon Orengall's spirit Pack. Wolves deal damage and draw fire before retreating to Silvern.
pactAbilities.Effect: Summon a spectral wolf.

pactAbilities.Description: Hail Alcaâ€™s winged children. A flock of phantom songbirds attack your target. Singing revenge.
pactAbilities.Effect: Birds deal tick damage & stagger to affected enemy & enemies near it.

pactAbilities.Description: Use your Glamour to sneak up on enemies and steal loot from their pockets.
pactAbilities.Effect: Unalerted enemies drop loot if you stay next to them.

pactAbilities.Description: Cast a cloud of magick dust. Enemies are blinded, leaving them vulnerable to sneak attacks.
pactAbilities.Effect: CC enemies near point of impact, as well as debuff them to take more stagger.

pactAbilities.Description: Your rule is supreme. Regain Arcanic power to cast Behest more quickly.
pactAbilities.Effect: Cooldown reduction for Behest.

pactAbilities.Description: Leap... And thump! Enemies in area of effect take damage. Nearby enemies are Staggered.
pactAbilities.Effect: It is a slam ability that can be casted on the ground to leap and slam, or already in the air to slam directly.

pactAbilities.Description: Bowl down foes with a Seismor. Raze the earth with a rolling ball of destruction.
pactAbilities.Effect: Send forth a boulder that explodes at the end.

pactAbilities.Description: Child of the shadow. Threats glow clearly in the dark.
pactAbilities.Effect: Able to see enemies through walls while in soul mode.

pactAbilities.Description: Targeted enemy heats up under your gaze, taking increasing fire damage till they burst into flame!
pactAbilities.Effect: Targeted enemy takes ever-increasing tick damage & is eventually set on fire.

pactAbilities.Description: By sacred song, seeds turn into saplings. Increased armour strength for you and nearby allies.
pactAbilities.Effect: Buffs armour for you and you allies in an aura around the caster.

pactAbilities.Description: Strength in numbers. Melee damage increases when an ally is in range. Can stack.
pactAbilities.Effect: Weapon damage increased per nearby ally.

pactAbilities.Description: Call forth the Stampede of Rood to charge through Enemies, stunning and doing damage.
pactAbilities.Effect: Conjure up a stampede of spectral stags.

pactAbilities.Description: Alca defends her children. Enemy attacks may be met with creeping Tendrils, which slow movement and deal damage over time.
pactAbilities.Effect: Chance to briefly freeze enemies that you've blocked, parried, or taken damage from.

pactAbilities.Description: A memory of corruption. Torment leeches Life from your foes and redistributes it to your allies.
pactAbilities.Effect: Deal damage to an enemy to heal yourself or your ally.

pactAbilities.Description: Set free your trickster shadow. A decoy draws enemy fire and explodes when foes get too close.
pactAbilities.Effect: An explosive decoy is summoned at the point of impact. Decoy aggroes nearby enemies, making them open for backstabs.

pactAbilities.Description: Water is life. Arcanic powers recharge more quickly when standing in water.
pactAbilities.Effect: Cooldown reduction for all abilities while standing in/on water.

pactAbilities.Description: Run free your silvern soul. Prowl ahead undetected, while your frame is left vulnerable.
pactAbilities.Effect: Turn into a wolf, temporarily leaving your envoy-form behind.

pactAbilities.Description: Rouse the ancient Wevetroots. Enemies are caught in the thorns, taking damage over time.
pactAbilities.Effect: Sends out a line of thorns to grab enemies.
